meanings.sent1: The hikers were traversing the mountain path carefully.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys traversing different countries to experience new cultures.
meanings.sent3: The cat was traversing the room in search of its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were traversing the possibilities of the future.
meanings.sent5: The river was traversing the valley, shaping the landscape over time.

meanings.definition: To move back and forth or sideways
meanings.sent1: The pendulum was traversing smoothly from left to right.
meanings.sent2: The snake was traversing the grass in a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent3: The robot was traversing the room, bumping into walls comically.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were traversing the bookshelves, searching for her favorite novel.
meanings.sent5: The wind was traversing the field, causing the wheat to sway gently.

meanings.sent1: The bridge was traversing the river, connecting the two banks.
meanings.sent2: The rainbow was traversing the sky after the rain stopped.
meanings.sent3: The vines were traversing the garden fence, creating a natural barrier.
meanings.sent4: The road was traversing the forest, leading deeper into the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The power lines were traversing the landscape, carrying electricity to homes.
